title: Hero MotoCorp vehicle sales rise to 4,33,598 units in January
description: Hero MotoCorp reports a 22% YoY increase in vehicle sales for January, reaching 4,33,598 units. Domestic sales show a 20% growth, totaling 4,20,934 units. Motorcycle sales contribute significantly to the overall figure, with a 21% rise to 3,02,056 units.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
